name: Bubble Shooter -- Lite
description:
The Bubble Shooter game takes it roots from Taito's popular 1986 arcade game Bubble Bobble. In 1994 new arcade game Puzzle Bobble closely based on original Bubble Bobble was released and in 2000 it (Puzzle Bobble) was ported to Windows.
Since then the game has been ported to numerous platform. So why should you give our version a try? We tried to recreate a full experience of the game in a tiny download package.

Aim and tap the screen to launch the next bubble to form a cluster of 3 or more. Clear the board before it fills up to move to the next level. Use menu (top-right corner button) to change level or to check score.

Don't forget to check our Game section for other fun games..
